programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flying Disc Fling - When a robo-toy causes mayhem in Adventure Bay, Ryder knows just who to call to save the far flung flying disc!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Wizard of Skidoo - Welcome to the wonderful world of Skidooland! As we head down the stripey brick road on our quest to get home, we'll meet Rainbow Puppy the Kind Witch, Tinbox, and even the Wizard of Skidoo himself- Steve!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hummy Gummies - Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep308
programme.desc: The Name's Chomp / Cactus-Throphe - Bobbi's galactic flapjacks attract a spaceship from another galaxy. It's Captain Chomp and her co-pilot, Kenny a prehistoric mammoth! // Steel uses a super-growth fertiliser to grow giant cacti flowers to replace Lady Fluffpot's bottle of perfume.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep825
programme.desc: Rubble and Wild and a Yarn Ball! / Skye and Rory Flip It - Rubble and Wild rescue animals from a giant runaway ball of yarn. // Skye and Rory rescue a painter hanging from a scaffold.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Spectacular Skating Spectacular / Gran-Gran Dreams of Japchae / Snow Party - Bossy wants to put on a skating show but he doesn't know how to skate. // Bossy and Turtle plan a special night for Gran-Gran but cant agree on planning. // Bossy tries to create a snow day party without snow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep214
programme.desc: The Kitty Cat Caper / The Legend of El Ratoncio Prez - Bonnie's cat tricks the crew into thinking he's a good pirate, but then they realize he's actually after their treasure. // The crew must team up with the fabled tooth mouse El Ratoncito Perez to retrieve his stolen cap and satchel from Enrique.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Cecilia And The Ghost Ship - Santi and crew must overcome ghostly shenanigans to save Cecilia from the dreaded Ghost Ship

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story - Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Lost Keys - After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep519
programme.desc: George's New Dinosaur - When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep53
programme.desc: Take a Break - When Monty sees Violet enjoying doing absolutely nothing, he starts to wonder if it is a good thing to take a break and relax.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Bad Mood - Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep52
programme.desc: The Story Badge - The squirrels do everything at the clubhouse, from reading and drawing, to running and dancing, and tire themselves out, so Duggee suggests they have a break with a story.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep51
programme.desc: The Teddy Bear Badge - The dog and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. However, they soon spot a huge teddy and discover it's Beryl.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep50
programme.desc: The Surprise Badge - The squirrels and Duggee buy Hennie a surprise present for her birthday - but first they need to wrap it up.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep33
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Geo Challenge - The Go Jetters test their knowledge and teamwork in a tricky maze full of trials. But can they escape the labyrinth, beat Glitch's high score and still keep the team together?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Double Babysitter - When Uncle Rad and Frisky accidentally turn up to babysit Bluey and Bingo on the same night, they have to work together to make Bluey feel better about babysitter put-downs.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Mr Monkeyjocks - Dad thinks the kids have too many toys and suggests a chuck out. To save their beloved Mr Monkeyjocks from getting the chop, Bluey and Bingo must prove he is special.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Andy and the Weddell Seals - Andy blasts off in his safari sub to Antarctica in search of a Weddell seal and her pup.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Off-Road Machines - Grace goes off-road as she drives the funny spider car, shows off the daring Formula Off-Road buggies and goes for a drive in an eight-wheeled all-terrain vehicle!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep15
programme.desc: Don't Make Me Laugh - Captain HeyHo has got the blues, but Cook and Line are determined to cheer her up. In order to put a smile back on her face, they set up their very own comedy club.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep16
programme.desc: The Philosophy Badge - The Squirrels think about life's big questions, helping Tino the artistic mouse escape a crisis of confidence and gaining their Philosophy badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep15
programme.desc: The Future Badge - The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot version of Duggee - and a few other interesting changes to the clubhouse too!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep14
programme.desc: The Family Photo Badge - The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family, earning their Family Photo Badges and a brilliant group picture in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Lightning Bolt Blackout - When lightning strikes Academy Island, it causes a power cut. Can the Go Jetters rescue their trapped friends without the power they need to call for Click-ons?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep17
programme.desc: Welcome Stafford - Spencer is on Sodor and is given the task of showing the new electric shunting engine, Stafford, around. Spencer puffs into Knapford station where he boasts to Thomas about his special task.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Moon's Exhibition - A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Tummy Talk - When Sarah forgets her sandwich, her rumbling tummy inadvertently starts a conversation with a Frog.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Music Show - On a very hot day, everyone has their windows open and they're all playing music...

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Dog Loves Warm - The bookshop is very cold, so Dog and Pug go to the Antarctic to find out how animals there keep warm. They discover that by running up and down hills they can keep warm.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep52
programme.desc: The Greatest Gift - Monty has no money to buy a gift for his mum. He wonders if a gift has to be large or cost money to be special.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep13
programme.desc: It's Time For a Boat Ride - JoJo and Gran Gran bump into Ned and Monty as they walk along the canal. Ned invites them onboard to go on a boat ride, where JoJo gets to act as captain - on the lookout for treasure!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hiders N' Seekers - In this episode, a small addition brings big excitement to a game of Hide N' Seek!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep9
programme.desc: The Amazing Fence - The Blockers are building a fence, but they accidentally create a maze. With one Blocker lost inside, can Team Tinpo help him find a way out?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep39
programme.desc: The Sleepover - A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep13
programme.desc: The Breakfast Badge - Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh! Luckily Duggee has his Breakfast Badge, and soon the Squirrels will too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep12
programme.desc: The Opposites Badge - The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with a little bit of help from a lot of topsy-turvy animal friends!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep30

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Mud Volcano, Azerbaijan - Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Turnip of Terror - Evil Pea tricks Supertato, and the Veggies, who fall into the Deli Counter and come face-to-face with the Turnip of Terror. They escape with help from the not so scary Turnip.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Veggies Got to Dance - Supertato's dancing is too powerful and too destructive but when he has to face Evil Pea in a dance off to save his trapped friends he soon realises his dancing can save the day.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep6

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep290
programme.desc: Spatula of the Heavens / Gary's Playhouse - SpongeBob embarks on an epic journey to have his beloved spatula reforged by the legendary Guru Greasetrap. // SpongeBob builds a snail-house outside for Gary to play in while he is at work.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep277
programme.desc: Captain Pipsqueak - Plankton joins the League of E.V.I.L.

programme.desc: Any Given Sundae - Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters.

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep706
programme.desc: Road Trip: Bringing Down the House / Road Trip: Mountain Hard Pass - During a visit of the White House, the Loud kids can't help but sneak off and explore the rooms not on the tour. // Intimidated by an intense day of hiking in the Rocky Mountains, the Loud kids try to find reasons to call off the hike.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Pop Pop the Question / Lynn and Order - When the kids discover Myrtle has a shady past, they try to expose her before Pop Pop proposes. // Lynn and Liam butt heads when they're forced to partner up as the middle school hall monitors.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep263
programme.desc: Who R Zoo? / The Kwarantined Krab - SpongeBob and Patrick create their own zoo made entirely of bubbles! // The Krusty Krab goes under emergency quarantine, but no one knows who carries the mysterious illness.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep168
programme.desc: Fiasco! - Plankton thinks he's stolen a Krabby Patty from the Krusty Krab, but he's really stolen an art piece by the famous artist, Fiasco.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep202
programme.desc: The Maltese Mantis - Po and Mantis visit the equivalent of an ancient Chinese Comic-Con, where Po's fanboy enthusiasm gets out of hand.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Most Dangerous Po - Po's visit to a famous war hero goes awry when he finds out the retired general is off his rocker.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep312
programme.desc: The Western Air Temple - The gang leaves the Fire Nation, humbled and embarrassed by the failure of the invasion. They head to the Western Air Temple.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Tunnel of Love - When a sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Tunnel of Love / Skipper Makes Perfect - When a sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation. // Skipper's having one of those perfect days, and he decides to use the opportunity to settle an old score.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Penguin Who Loved Me - When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out its to free her brother Francis who happens to be a mind-jacked Dr. Blowhole.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Gilf of the Mech Suit / Worst Curse Scenario - On Lily's birthday, Parker gifts her a homemade cardboard suit, but it can't measure up to her mech suit. // The Middlemost Post receives a mysterious trinket in the mail, which they come to believe brings bad luck.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Blue Spirit - After Sokka and Katara get sick due to being in the storm, Aang seeks out a cure and discovers he needs some frozen frogs in order to get them cured.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Fortuneteller - Aang, Katara, and Sokka discover a village of people who are all reliant on a fortuneteller in their everyday lives but they are so reliant that they are blind to the immanent danger they are all in.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Animal Hearts / Beast & Beaster - Best and Bester gate-crash the set of their favorite soap opera in order to find out what happens next. // Bester sets out to prove to a cynical Best that the new "Beast of Bettervale" movie is based on a true story.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Rocky the Vote / One Star Hotel - It's election day and Bester finds herself running for President of the Book Club against her good friend Rocky. // When Best and Bester accidently list the Sub as a guest house, they receive a visitor who they simply must impress.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Forever Home / Broken Telephone - Corn and Peg set out to find a 'forever' home for each and every animal at the Galloping Grove Animal Shelter. // When the telephones aren't working, Corn and Peg help deliver messages for Ms Sassy.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Man vs. Sewer / The Mutant Menace - The TMNT's lazy river ride through the sewers turns savage when Raph's accidentally separated and left alone. // The Turtles' failed attempts to do good deeds turn all of New York against them.

programme.title: Wallykazam! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Explorers Club - Wally and Ogre Doug start a club for explorers and set out to find the rare Chickephant. But trouble brews when Bobgoblin starts a rival club with Hattie the Witch.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Too Tired to Tuba / Princess Flug Day - Chef Jeff is nervous about a tuba concret and keeps everyone up all might with his practicing. // Princess Flug wants Melvin's party to be her own party so badly and with out meaning to, she almost spolis his day.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Hair Flair Fuzzly / The Fuzzlies in the Attic - Mrs. Melvin's hairbrush goes missing, and Abby tracks it to a brand new Fuzzly who loves to style hair. // When the Fuzzly twins, Mo and Bo, get separated in the hotel, it's up to Abby to get them back together again.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep119
programme.desc: Gullible Pants / Overbooked - SpongeBob is left in charge of the Krusty Krab while Mr. Krabs steps out for 15 minutes, and he is determined to make it the best-managed 15 minutes ever! // SpongeBob's got a full day, and he's determined to do everything he's scheduled to do.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep120
programme.desc: No Hat for Pat / Toy Store Of Doom - Patrick is sick of all of his friends not being able to play with him because they have to put on their Krusty Krab hats and go to work. // A new toy store has opened up in Bikini Bottom, and SpongeBob and Patrick couldn't be happier!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep121
programme.desc: Sand Castles in the Sand / Shell Shocked - A friendly day of building sand castles soon turns into war when SpongeBob and Patrick use their sand creations to battle each other. // Gary desperately needs a new shell, but all the shells on the market are either too expensive or too fragile.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep122
programme.desc: Chum Bucket Supreme / Single Cell Anniversary - Plankton hires Patrick to create advertising slogans for the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob helps Plankton find the perfect anniversary gift for Karen.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep125
programme.desc: Pineapple Fever / Chum Caverns - Squidward gets stuck indoors with SpongeBob and Patrick during a storm. // Plankton creates an underground restaurant that threatens to put the Krusty Krab out of business.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep126
programme.desc: The Clash of Triton - King Neptune is celebrating his birthday at the Krusty Krab, and SpongeBob wants to make sure all his friends and family are there, including his son, Triton.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Party Animals - Alvin books the band at a birthday party only to discover they've been booked for the petting zoo, as the pets!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Warren Seville - When Alvin tries to break Theodore's dependence on Talking Teddy, Theodore invents a new imaginary friend.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Excavation Vacation - When Simon falls ill, Alvin takes his place on a camping trip only to discover it's actually an archeological dig.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Race Against the Machine / My Fair Cat Lady - When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! // Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Store Wars with the Casagrandes / Lucha Fever with the Casagrandes - When a fancy new grocery store opens on the block, Bobby rallies the family to do everything they can to compete. // Ronnie Anne fakes being sick to watch a Lubra Libre match, which proves to be more difficult than anticipated.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Present Tense / Any Given Sundae - Convinced that their scrapbook isn't good enough for Dad's birthday, the Loud kids seek out the perfect gift. // Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters

programme.desc: Case of the Moon-Days / Portrait of a Monster - In order to evade Monster Hunters, Clawdeen must accept who she is to save herself and Cleo. // Frankie's identity crisis during picture days causes her to ZAP a camera into a live, soulsucking menace.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep243

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Tuivasa vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the UFCs hardest punchers returns to the Octagon on March 17, as Australian knockout artist Tai Tuivasa travels to the APEX in Las Vegas to tackle fellow top ten heavyweight contender Marcin Tybura. Packing some significant power in his own right, Polands Tybura has won seven of his last nine en route to his showdown with fan favorite Bam Bam, who has ended his last five victories, including wins over Derrick Lewis and Augusto Sakai, via knockout

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Tuivasa vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the UFCs hardest punchers returns to the Octagon on March 17, as Australian knockout artist Tai Tuivasa travels to the APEX in Las Vegas to tackle fellow top ten heavyweight contender Marcin Tybura. programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback
programme.desc: UFC Fight Flashback 1002: Usman vs. Covington 2 - UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Prelims - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.
